SELECT IFNULL((CASE WHEN #{filterMap.codeLevel}='0' THEN CONCAT(Bcl.CLASSES_NAME,'/',mac.MACHINING_NAME,'/',Cbr.BREED_NAME,'/',Dfe.FEATURE_NAME,'/',Egr.WEIGHT_NAME) WHEN #{filterMap.codeLevel}='1' THEN CONCAT(Bcl.CLASSES_NAME,'/',mac.MACHINING_NAME,'/',Cbr.BREED_NAME) WHEN #{filterMap.codeLevel}='2' THEN CONCAT(Bcl.CLASSES_NAME,'/',mac.MACHINING_NAME,'/',Cbr.BREED_NAME,'/',Dfe.FEATURE_NAME) WHEN #{filterMap.codeLevel}='3' THEN CONCAT(Bcl.CLASSES_NAME,'/',mac.MACHINING_NAME) END),'') AS pdName ,IFNULL((CASE WHEN #{filterMap.codeLevel}='0' THEN CONCAT(Bcl.CLASSES_CODE,mac.MACHINING_CODE,Cbr.BREED_CODE,Dfe.FEATURE_CODE,Egr.WEIGHT_CODE) WHEN #{filterMap.codeLevel}='1' THEN CONCAT(Bcl.CLASSES_CODE,mac.MACHINING_CODE,Cbr.BREED_CODE) WHEN #{filterMap.codeLevel}='2' THEN CONCAT(Bcl.CLASSES_CODE,mac.MACHINING_CODE,Cbr.BREED_CODE,Dfe.FEATURE_CODE) WHEN #{filterMap.codeLevel}='3' THEN CONCAT(Bcl.CLASSES_CODE,mac.MACHINING_CODE) END),'') AS pdCode ,IFNULL(Ast.STANDARD_ID,'') AS standardId ,IFNULL(Ast.CLASSES_CODE,'') AS classesCode ,IFNULL(Bcl.CLASSES_NAME,'') AS classesName FROM PD_STANDARD AS Ast INNER JOIN PD_CLASSES Bcl ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Bcl.CLASSES_CODE INNER JOIN pd_machining mac ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = mac.CLASSES_CODE AND mac.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE INNER JOIN PD_BREED Cbr ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Cbr.CLASSES_CODE AND Cbr.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Cbr.BREED_CODE INNER JOIN PD_FEATURE Dfe ON Ast.FEATURE_CODE = Dfe.FEATURE_CODE AND Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Dfe.CLASSES_CODE AND Dfe.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Dfe.BREED_CODE INNER JOIN pd_weight Egr ON Ast.WEIGHT_CODE =Egr.WEIGHT_CODE AND Ast.FEATURE_CODE = Egr.FEATURE_CODE AND Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Egr.CLASSES_CODE AND Egr.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Egr.BREED_CODE
ORDER BY Ast.CLASSES_CODE,Ast.MACHINING_CODE,Ast.BREED_CODE,Ast.FEATURE_CODE,Ast.WEIGHT_CODE
